name: LM Vertical Grinding Mills
overview: SBM success in absorbing foreign experience and producing our vertical grinding mill. Now it has wide application in metallurgy, construction, chemical and mining industries, being the preferred equipments in grinding industry.
feature: Low operation cost and long service life
application: LM series vertical grinding mills are widely used in grinding non-flammable and non-explosive materials under 9.3(the Moh's hardness), such as grinding quartz, feldspar, calcite, etc.
